price: 101. Apabila sangkakala ditiup, maka tidak ada lagi pertalian keluarga di antara mereka pada hari itu (Hari Kiamat), dan tidak (pula) mereka saling bertanya.
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri falā ansāba baynahum yawma-idhin walā yatasāalūna
